name: Progress Bar
description: A horizontal bar used to show completed progress

progress.label: Progress
progress.description: The amount of progress to display. A number 0-1.

color.label: Progress Color
color.description: Custom color for the progress shown

unfilledColor.label: Unfilled Color
unfilledColor.description: The color of the unfilled portion of the progress bar(eg. if at 50% then this is the color of the other 50%)

borderRadius.label: Border Radius
borderRadius.description: The border radius of the bar

borderWidth.label: Border Width
borderWidth.description: The width of the border that surrounds the bar.

borderColor.label: Border Color
borderColor.description: Custom color for border of the entire bar

animationType.label: Animation Type
animationType.description: The type of animation that occurs when the bar is filled(Default is Spring)
